subtitle: Your guide through Belgian administration
questionsTitle: A few questions about your situation
congratulationsMessage: You have completed all your tasks! Good luck on your journey in Belgium.

europeanID.question: Do you have a valid European ID or passport?
options: Yes, I have a European ID or passport
No, I only have a non-EU document

contract.question: Do you already have a signed employment contract?

plukkaart.question: Do you have a plukkaart (seasonal work permit)?
options: No, I still need to get it
I don't know what that is

duration.question: How long do you plan to work in Belgium?

workProvince.question: In which province will you be working?

bankAccount.question: Do you already have a Belgian bank account?
options: No, I need to open one
I plan to use a foreign account
